text: أَفَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُم بَأۡسُنَا بَيَٰتٗا وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ

translation.en: Then, did the people of the cities feel secure from Our punishment coming to them at night while they were asleep
translation.id: Maka apakah penduduk negeri itu merasa aman dari siksaan Kami yang datang malam hari ketika mereka sedang tidur
